913221549964001281.text: 2/2 "... you have to do it with tolerance, respect, responsibility, transparency and with honesty", # LenínEnCNN

913221499867279361.text: 1/2 "I never had an aspiration for power, I was pushed towards power, but when it's your turn to exercise it ..." # LenínEnCNN

913221352747929600.text: "I aspire to be a humanist. I believe in the human being ", # LenínEnCNN

913219072787144704.text: We are friends from all over the world. The distance should only have respect for self-determination, non-interference by countries, # LenínEnCNN

913218949113958400.text: Central themes of the #ConsultaPopular: "Institution, ecology, indefinite re-election, sanctions against corruption", # LenínEnCNN

913218901475037185.text: I chose the #ConsultaPopular because I think it deserves in the short term to make substantial changes in the institutionality of Ecuador # LenínEnCNN

913218848341536768.text: "The #ConsultaPopular is a right of citizens; It is a right of the President to call a #ConsultaPopular ", # LenínEnCNN

913218772902785024.text: "We ask #JulianAssange to stop commenting on the policy of Ecuador and friendly countries, his asylum status does not allow it", # LenínEnCNN

913218715948339200.text: "#Ecuador does not have the death penalty, respects the right to life," # LenínEnCNN

913218678866546689.text: "Ecuador granted asylum to #JulianAssange because she believed that her life was in danger", # LenínEnCNN

913218643906965510.text: "#JulianAssange will be at the Embassy of Ecuador in London the time it takes to safeguard his life", # LenínEnCNN

913218107736457216.text: 2/2 "... you have the right to your physical, psychological, social security, you have the right to be happy", # LenínEnCNN

913218070105280514.text: 1/2 "The human being, regardless of his inclination or tendency, has the right to be free ...", # LenínEnCNN

913218035703525376.text: "The Constitution says the possibility of establishing a couple and having rights of all kinds", # LenínEnCNN

913217987271970816.text: "The abortion issue is not political, it's about health, it should not get into the political plane", #LenguajeInclusivo

913217802705756181.text: "We want to start an aggressive program to provide drinking water and sewerage to populations of the country", # LenínEnCNN

913217767435898880.text: "We are going to start a program that is already budgeted: Health for All", # LenínEnCNN

913217727006986241.text: "We started a program to eradicate child malnutrition", # LenínEnCNN

913217688620675072.text: 2/2 "... without any cost, and for the rest, what I can pay", # LenínEnCNN

913217651991859203.text: 1/2 "That's why we started the program #CasaParaTodos, to provide housing for those people in a state of helplessness ...", # LenínEnCNN

913217614985486338.text: 2/2 "... we should consider a world, a government, an unworthy country if we tolerate that without doing anything about it", # LenínEnCNN

913217584287424513.text: 1/2 "It can not be possible that a woman or an old man does not have a home to live in, that is unworthy ...", # LenínEnCN

913217549667651589.text: "The human being must have a house", # LenínEnCNN

913217516171857920.text: We are socialists at heart, we are vindicating principles of the Constitution of Montecristi, rights to human beings, # LenínEnCNN

913217482248409088.text: "We must all respect the new way of understanding institutionality: independence of functions, it is the most healthy", # LenínEnCNN

913217448614260736.text: "That here 'governs the right', is a crutch created to cover several things that are uncovered, # LenínEnCNN

913217413348544514.text: "The best way for institutions to function is to let each function freely carry out its activity", # LenínEnCNN

913217352669581312.text: "That of the persecution is a lie: for the first time, a long time ago ...", # LenínEnCNN https://t.co/1jYsI8qOet

913215854199918598.text: "So you can see the 'table served' that they left us", # LenínEnCNN

913215443015479296.text: "No problem with the pensions of @ IESSec", # LenínEnCNN

913214200574554113.text: "When irregularities were detected in the Central San Francisco, the Government -in an honest way- claimed and fined Odebrecht", # LenínEnCNN

913213858390691840.text: I worry so little synderesis in the subsequent behavior: I respected the president when he dismantled the 'Manuela Espejo', # LenínEnCNN

913213717826990081.text: "When I left the vice presidency, the Mission 'Manuela Espejo' was immediately dismantled," # LenínEnCNN

913213649992474624.text: "When I was vice president of Rafael Correa I always respected him and he respected me", # LenínEnCNN

913213533579546624.text: "Withdrawing the functions to the vice president is a constitutional attribution", # LenínEnCNN

913213444383535105.text: "Without prior notice (Jorge Glas) he sent me an extremely rude letter and what I did was remove the functions", # LenínEnCNN

913213407305830400.text: "I assigned the vice president (Jorge Glas) the functions he asked me, which he said he was able to carry out," # LenínEnCNN

913213365555810309.text: "I trust people: the principle of presumption of innocence, until the person is not guilty, is very valuable", # LenínEnCNN

913213306709606400.text: "I think the #ConsultaPopular is something necessary for several reasons", # LenínEnCNN https://t.co/SlmLsfbCiy

913210227536822273.text: 2/2 "... that a camera is installed and the person is not warned about this", # LenínEnCNN

913210170020417536.text: 1/2 "I trust people, however I consider it a rudeness, a lack of courtesy, at least ...", # LenínEnCNN

913209892965687296.text: 1/2 "We recognized that it is necessary for freedom of expression to be maintained more clearly, more clearly, more freely ...", # LenínEnCNN

913209854814298112.text: "That's why in @UN I spoke about the alternability, the need to promote schools of political education for ... https://t.co/haekUXzVHw

913209650488717313.text: "The president is made to believe that he is the only one elected to govern and there is a somewhat strange deification," # LenínEnCNN

913209608059195392.text: "The administrative, electoral, economic, social environment generally works for and for that", # LenínEnCNN

913209178663145472.text: 2/2 "... that feeds us extraordinarily the thoughts, the ideas, the concepts that we have", # LenínEnCNN

913209137277923331.text: 1/2 "Dialog not necessarily with the one who thinks the same, you have to fundamentally dialogue with the one who thinks differently ...", # LenínEnCNN

913208943794585600.text: "Nowhere in the political ideology, as I remember, is it said that there is no need to dialogue", # LenínEnCNN

913208886060048389.text: "He did not like (Rafael Correa) that I say it like that, he did not like to call #NationalDialogue", # LenínEnCNN

913208842770673664.text: "Immediately we had to go to work, to solve", # LenínEnCNN

913208757919903745.text: "The debt that was said did not exceed USD 27 billion, approximately 27% of GDP, exceeded USD 60 billion," # LenínEnCNN

913208711476326405.text: "We had talked a lot with Rafael Correa and he told me that 'the table was served'; it's a 'table served', but with nothing ", # LenínEnCNN

913208655377567744.text: 2/2 "... those things that were half encrypted, that moment I realized that the situation was very difficult, very complex", # LenínEnCNN

913208615099666437.text: 1/2 "But the moment I arrived at the Government, the moment we won the elections and I started to inform myself of all ...", # LenínEnCNN

913208581163536385.text: "An economic, political panorama quite convenient, supposedly, to be able to adequately exercise the Government", # LenínEnCNN

913208525131788288.text: "He gave me a panorama of a country that I did not know about; I worked exclusively in the social area, there I dedicated myself "... https://t.co/zMmZZhROPp

913208344952938496.text: 2/2 "... he told me that the revolution had no other way to continue, that the people needed me, that he needed a successor ...", # LenínEnCNN

913208302762381312.text: 1/2 "He (Rafael Correa) came to insistently ask me to be his candidate for president ...", # LenínEnCNN

913208267043680256.text: I think that was the purpose and the problem of having left me the post ", # LenínEnCNN

913208233078161408.text: 2/2 "... which is specified in the Constitution of Montecristi, became a kind of obsession to maintain power", # LenínEnCNN

913208191483367425.text: 1/2 "That Rafael Correa was changing with time and, suddenly, what he manifested about the alternability ...", # LenínEnCNN

913208129655070726.text: "I met Rafael Correa as a young man full of enthusiasm, fond of that Constitution and principles", ... https://t.co/DbiuvdHcXM

913207985928884224.text: "The moment we become accustomed to a single form of behavior, we end up imprisoned in them", # LenínEnCNN

913207853875433472.text: 1/2 "I'm not too worried about uncertainties either; human beings are sometimes full of certainties, we want certainty ... ", # LenínEnCNN

913207807255678977.text: "The human being is designed to change, anatomically, physiologically, psychologically, spiritually is designed to change", # LenínEnCNN

913207767309185024.text: "The dialectic imposes changes, otherwise it would not be dialectical", # LenínEnCNN

913207731821121536.text: 2/2 "... militants of left parties, which brought the dialectical materialist conception of life", # LenínEnCNN

913207690171740160.text: 1/2 "That's why I want to go back to that Constitution, which had a group of idealistic young people ...", # LenínEnCNN

913207601122471936.text: "I respond to a principle that generated the Constitution of Montecristi", # LenínEnCNN

913207560186023936.text: "The only thing I am doing is what responds to my ideological conviction", # LenínEnCNN

910607117257715713.text: "For that, love for others, honesty and a sense of community is essential", # LenínEnLaONU

910607084990889984.text: "We do not want compassionate societies, but solidarity", # LenínEnLaONU

910606873212129281.text: "We must promote a new international order based on peace, respect for differences, equality and sunshine ... https://t.co/z8DpEhFRv7

910606732530978816.text: "We must maintain the defense of liberties, including freedom of expression and worship", # LenínEnLaONU

910606386844901376.text: "With dialogue, democracy is built, which is a path and at the same time an end", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/B2JQOH0zXI

910606203696373760.text: 2/2 "... to achieve agreements that allow building a more humane, just and democratic society", # LenínEnLaONU

910606183374970880.text: 1/2 "When I started my government, I called a great # DiálogoNacional, without excluding anyone ...", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/UvIrFOCngD

910605502089973760.text: "Closing borders is not the solution. It has never been, in the history of mankind ", # LenínEnLaONU

910605450810396677.text: "We strongly support the global pact on migration, which is being discussed in this house," # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/nD63lcKUjP

910605206647435264.text: "Human mobility enriches peoples and contributes to combating all forms of discrimination and xenophobia", # LenínEnLaONU

910603310033506304.text: 2/2 "... to stop deforestation and combat climate change", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910603288546041858.text: 1/2 "In the dialogue convened by the general secretary of @UN, I presented the initiative #EcuadorPorElAmbiente", ... https://t.co/cUJ57sgizo

910603191389233152.text: 2/2 "... the protection of the largest river basin in the world", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910603133889499136.text: "As you know, Ecuador is one of the 8 Amazonian countries", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910602404726439938.text: "Those who pollute the most must assume greater responsibility", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910602378180747264.text: "We have common but differentiated responsibilities", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910602156532752385.text: "We are the developing countries that pay the highest costs", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente

910602067873591307.text: The unlimited exploitation of nature, has led us to live the consequences of climate change ", ... https://t.co/9jE53aejly

910601605636124672.text: 3/3 "The responsibility to combat climate change", # LenínEnLaONU #EcuadorPorElAmbiente https://t.co/GkcdDFc6wH

910601526107926528.text: 2/3 "... with the affected peoples and I refer to one of the greatest challenges we have as a humanity:", # LenínEnLaONU

910601375150731270.text: 1/3 "Looking at the devastation caused by climatic phenomena of recent weeks, I express my solidarity ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910600714291949568.text: "We appreciate the support of all the countries that share this initiative", # LenínEnLaONU

910600684852137985.text: 2/2 "... on transnational corporations and human rights ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910600657454927873.text: 1/2 "Another mechanism to promote transparency is to have a binding instrument ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910599926979219460.text: "Ecuador, since the Presidency of # G77másChina, has promoted this global agenda for fair tax actions", # LenínEnLaONU

910599687119482885.text: 2/2 "... that no public official may have resources or assets in # ParaísosFiscales", # LenínEnLaONU # Fight against Corruption

910599595633324037.text: 1/2 "In our country, through popular consultation, the Ecuadorian people decided ...", # LenínEnLaONU # Fight against Corruption

910599374912311297.text: "If we want to fight corruption, we must promote a culture of transparency", # LenínEnLaONU # Fight against Corruption

910599238614122496.text: "The use of # ParaísosFiscales has served to hide corruption, both in the public and private spheres", # LenínEnLaONU

910598938960580609.text: "This injustice goes against the right to development and human dignity", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/5A9G8u91FJ

910598798392664064.text: "It is inadmissible that 8 people have the same wealth as the poorest half of humanity", # LenínEnLaONU

910598775357546496.text: "We have another great challenge: the alarming inequality in the world", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/UFYv8T1isP

910598302650990592.text: "Thus, step by step, the proclamation of the Community of Latin American and Caribbean States is fulfilled, of being a region of peace", # LenínEnLaONU

910598261295247361.text: "We celebrate the Quito Agreement, announced a few days ago, for the" bilateral and temporary ceasefire "in Colombia," # LenínEnLaONU

910597592333025280.text: RT @Presidencia_Ec: "Militarism is not the answer. It only brings suffering, pain and death ", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/8gVlF8333F

910597489224544256.text: 2/2 "... with the National Liberation Army, in our country", # LenínEnLaONU

910597453765898240.text: 1/2 "Therefore, we strongly support the peace dialogues carried out by the Government of Sister Colombia ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910597128048857088.text: "Militarism is not the answer. It only brings suffering, pain and death ", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/8gVlF8333F

910596312348884992.text: 2/2 "... we can never achieve true freedom and democracy", # LenínEnLaONU

910596279046205440.text: 1/2 "If we continue with the wars and the blockades to states and peoples, like the blockade of the brother people of Cuba ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910595579482378241.text: "Dear citizens of the world:", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/XIoHjFdDTU

910594954417885185.text: "... of the Sustainable Development Goals, be wasted in the absurdity of the war ?. # LenínEnLaONU

910594927914086401.text: 1/2 "How is it possible that resources that can be used to finance compliance ...", # LenínEnLaONU

910594624988819457.text: "That is why we do not understand that the traffickers are condemned and persecuted, and not the producers of weapons", # LenínEnLaONU

910594419472109571.text: "What is the ethics that is at stake?", # LenínEnLaONU https://t.co/9lRkyoo5CM

910594320381685760.text: "We know that the military industry is a big business", # LenínEnLaONU

910593810480205825.text: "This shows us that as humanity, we are failing. We must commit ourselves to building peace ", ... https://t.co/Hw9I9cNKSy

910593575179685889.text: 3/3 "And to a planet that must act against the devastating effects of climate change. So we are on our way to destruction ", # LenínEnLaONU

910593534918643712.text: 2/3 "We are witnessing a possible nuclear confrontation, with increasing levels of inequality and poverty", # LenínEnLaONU

910593500189687808.text: 1/3 "We must recognize that we are in a difficult and painful moment of humanity. We face multiple crises ", # LenínEnLaONU

910592858465488897.text: "And it is with this premise that we must govern, live, administer and act", # LenínEnLaONU

910592823036190720.text: "My indigenous brothers taught me that we were born to be happy", # LenínEnLaONU

910592642119077890.text: "In which the beginning and the end, is the satisfaction of the needs of all and a life with dignity", ... https://t.co/YSG4kkhv6j

910592514926809088.text: "We inherit from the original peoples the notion of a world centered on the human being and his relationship with nature", # LenínEnLaONU

910591716037677056.text: "Today, the entire humanity has a moral and ethical duty", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida https://t.co/1rLtku6pRH

910591605920411648.text: "No more femicides! Not one less! ", # LenínEnLaONU

910591332338556928.text: "We will not allow thousands of women and girls to be mistreated or killed", # LenínEnLaONU

910591089802924032.text: 2/2 "... it is also urgent to eradicate all forms of violence", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910591061612990466.text: 1/2 "And in this vision of guaranteeing the rights of each person for a lifetime ...", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910590802237313025.text: "I refer to the care and care of the elderly", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910590767726546944.text: "In which we reward the people who have served society and their families", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910590724986548224.text: "And in the end the stage of gratitude arrives", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida https://t.co/rEGD6pOD1R

910590553481506816.text: 1/2 "Then comes the stage in which the human being is accompanied, to ensure the welfare of their families", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910590414364823555.text: "In the next stage of life, our support is essential to promote young people", # LenínEnLaONU ... https://t.co/0jX11SEnuX

910590336736604160.text: 2/3 "... to sport to form the will and the spirit, awakening the sensibility ...", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

910590193714987011.text: 1/3 "Then comes the stage that inspires the new being, promoting love of science, knowledge, art", # LenínEnLaONU #PlanTodaUnaVida

903323482154524673.text: "In the new Ecuador, the public and private sectors work hand in hand for the benefit of Ecuadorians", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903322543091851265.text: "In addition, there is the construction of the Playas-El Morro-Posorja highway, as a complementary work to the port", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903322034373103616.text: "In June 2019 the first boat will arrive, there is little time left to start, build, and above all to learn", #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903321732588728321.text: "Together we will surely move forward, Posorja and Ecuador deserve it, never doubt it!", @Lenin Moreno

903321333576212481.text: "Thank you all for daring to dream big and endow the country with a First World infrastructure", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903321216857014273.text: "... for the copper refining plant", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903321135407882240.text: "The hydroelectric capacity of the country will allow us to have investors ...", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903320840334438400.text: "... created energy and some others", @ Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903320738328928258.text: "... in processors, in copper refineries, in aluminum, we will need the generation of the sources ...", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903320299441152000.text: "In the zone of economic development, surely there will be many people interested in investing ...", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903319353520779265.text: "With this port will change the lives of thousands of families thanks to the rebound and economic activities", @ Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903319250982535169.text: "There are already plans of the private company to build a shipyard in the vicinity of the port", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903318903555854338.text: "This road will generate hundreds of jobs that will add to the 2,500 direct and indirect jobs", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903318679831629825.text: "In your hands and your kind attention is that tourists fall more in love with our beautiful country", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903318157787631620.text: "The port will be a starting point for the emergence of tourist businesses", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903318063633895424.text: "The generation of employment will not be limited solely to port issues", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903318005723144192.text: "Posorja begins to write a future of prosperity, which will turn it into a pole of development", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317885728301058.text: "After 50 years, the port and all its infrastructure will be delivered to the State", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317825196097536.text: "... in that period the State will receive USD 2,700 million in revenue to the State budget", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317511776727041.text: "The operation of the port will be in charge of the investors for 50 years ...", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317436740636673.text: "... and it is carried out through the public-private partnership modality, an alliance in which we all win", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317372014092289.text: "This is one of the largest private investments that Ecuador has received ...", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317216015392773.text: "Thank you for trusting us, thank you for investing in the country and promoting national development", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903317023685582848.text: "It is an investment of approximately USD 1,200 million in charge of @DP_World and @ConsorcioNobis Ecuadorian", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903316746446270464.text: "It is important to point out that this mega-construction does not cost a single penny to the country", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903316571984146434.text: "Ecuador needs projects of this size that make us competitive and allow us to dream big", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903316256547364864.text: "We build infrastructure for the demands of the present and also for the demands and welfare of the future", @Lenin #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903316172292186118.text: "With this work our country will be placed at the level of development that the world demands", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903315938845630464.text: "We are the only country on the west coast of South America that does not have a port with water at least 15 meters deep", #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903315857375346688.text: "It has taken decades for Ecuador to have a port with these characteristics", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903315600516288515.text: "Ecuador can not wait a minute of its progress towards progress and development", @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

903315538683863040.text: "This work will bring employment, production, investment, but, above all, welfare to the citizens" @Lenin Moreno #PosorjaEsDesarrollo

900149027802669057.text: Head of State @Lenin Moreno, authorities and mayors of Cañar met at @GOBERCANAR https://t.co/n6GP80fEEc

900130605517516800.text: With a ¡We support you @Lenin !, citizens of Cañar received the President upon his arrival at @GOBERCANAR https://t.co/eqoYnalBrh

900117989000916996.text: RT @Lenin: You have to give young people freedom to achieve their dreams. #Education ReportEC https://t.co/NhetOuoFnY

900093240157904896.text: Get to know the #EducationEducationEC with the participation of the President @Lenin Moreno from Azogues ▶ ️ ... https://t.co/tRXCpiTxbj

900091227227521025.text: "Let's build a country where young people have the freedom to achieve their dreams", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900091140921323520.text: "Let's dream with a present in which nobody sees their hopes truncated", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900091048587874306.text: "Those dreams must include all young people, without exception", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900090942392107008.text: "... with relevant curricular meshes, dreams are bigger", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900090838394515457.text: "With quality education, trained teachers, adequate infrastructure ...", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900090743473262592.text: "Education generates knowledge and professional forms that contribute to improving the lives of thousands of families", @Lenin #Education ReportEC

900090583817089024.text: "We can not allow thousands of young people to stay without pursuing the career of their dreams", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900090359417647104.text: "It is a priority that we begin to understand education as a commitment", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900088287657943040.text: "We have decided to bet on young people, young people who always have creative ideas", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900088199795662848.text: "We started delivering hundreds of credits to young people", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900088150176956416.text: "With @PlanTodaUnaVida, thousands of young people will have the opportunity to become entrepreneurs", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900087835046420480.text: "We will create the productive technical baccalaureate, in addition to many other specializations", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/tw947P0ssj

900087317104390144.text: "We will reinforce and reactivate the Technical Baccalaureate", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900087172040208384.text: "We will promote quality postgraduate programs", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900087114481750016.text: "We are going to expand the educational offer to respond to the needs and challenges of the country", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900087045988769797.text: "We will continue to provide scholarships for teachers and students", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEducaciónEC https://t.co/mzKmGkxkrN

900086916284133376.text: "We can do a lot for education, we will try to advance the best and as fast as possible", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900086829285863424.text: "Congratulations, @Freddy_AlvarezG, Rector of @UNAEcuador, and all his teaching staff", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/Yn0DjCJgKi

900086517019947008.text: "In the new Ecuador, being a teacher is synonymous with pride and is synonymous with dignity", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/8U7UPnwd2u

900086354293522433.text: "Kidnapped by an organization that pitifully saw this profession as a political opportunity", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900086279551025153.text: "How many years the education of our children was condemned to mediocrity!", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900086227680022529.text: "... we are revaluing the teaching work and the educational system", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900086116631576578.text: "Through a vision of integral, pedagogical and humanistic education ...", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900086002513047552.text: "Hence the importance of having the @UNAEcuador, focused only on the training of educators", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/YR0LTI1fup

900085748703145984.text: "It's no use having schools, colleges and universities, if there are no trained and committed teachers", @Lenin #Education ReportEC

900085626535587844.text: "The deficit in Higher Education is almost 10,000 professors with PHD degrees", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900085300311060482.text: "The optimum is 150,472 teachers and we have 149,196, without a doubt, a very important achievement", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900085204781551616.text: Currently, the deficit of teachers in secondary education is barely 1,276 professionals ", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/XNTqRCkFVh

900085080466628608.text: "One of the positive results has been the growing demand for students and teachers", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900084909389357057.text: "We are located among the countries with more development in recent times", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900084438364762112.text: "We have come a long way, as registered by the @Unesco studies", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900084275969761280.text: "... many of which will surely come out of this university", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900084210828013569.text: "... we also need infrastructure, teachers, trained and well-paid pedagogues", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900084020653981696.text: "Not only do we need motivated children and parents who are committed to the development of their children ...", @ Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900083592369451009.text: "We are committed to guarantee initial, basic, intermediate, superior, special and intercultural education ...", @Lenin #Education ReportEC

900083449868038144.text: "Our biggest obligation is with the young people of the Homeland", @Lenin Moreno #EducaciónEducaciónEC https://t.co/c9T20TUK9T

900083259580841984.text: "... today they are 7 out of 10. We are going to make them 10 out of 10", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900083173396238337.text: "Before 5 of every 10 young people of age of baccalaureate were enrolled in an educational institution ..." @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900083019603726336.text: "Dear teachers: they are the basis on which our children and young people will settle their future lives", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/csa9MiQepN

900081928912687104.text: "An educated people is able to improve their living conditions", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEducaciónEC https://t.co/GRR9sbAPuX

900081809970651142.text: "... is the way to achieve progress and development", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900081750365306880.text: "Education is the tool that drives us to fly ever higher ...", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900081549089136641.text: "We are going to create propaedeutic courses so that students can access knowledge", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900080650174312449.text: "170 thousand young people did not find space, who did not pass the exam to access university", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900079735207755776.text: "Dear teachers, you have the responsibility to train them, not only academically, but in values ​​and principles" #Education ReportEC

900079592224030721.text: "... you need people who can transform reality", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900079504701476864.text: "You do not only need teachers, lawyers and doctors to transform the productive matrix ...", @ Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900079226581381121.text: "It is time to educate those who will forge children and young people", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900078826172162049.text: "Without dialogue it is impossible to build knowledge, there is no other way to eliminate myths than learning", @Lenin Moreno #Education ReportEC

900078775332941825.text: RT @Presidencia_Ec: "I feel completely satisfied, this is a beautiful and functional building", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEducaciónEC ...

900078501210066945.text: "I feel completely satisfied, this is a beautiful and functional building", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/r1wxX15jHA

899802755870490625.text: "We must not only reject and fight violence, but work hard, for peace, harmony and respect", #ElGobiernoInforma

899802708676411394.text: "It would seem that intolerance and violence want to dominate the world", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899802562576207873.text: "It hurts to note that it has been a week of extreme violence in Europe ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899802369109700608.text: "... so that - neither this one, nor any other fishing fleet - attempts against our wealth", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899802323588984833.text: "I have arranged to @CancilleriaEc, to carry out all the legal and diplomatic procedures ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899802264805588992.text: We will not allow them to violate our maritime sovereignty! @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899802225937199106.text: "We present a formal protest to the People's Republic of China, for the presence of this immense fishing fleet", ... https://t.co/138HMD0U60

899802111243931648.text: "... it is a crime, not only against the # Galapagos ecosystem, but against the planet. We are all outraged! ", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

899802069380497408.text: "Fishing in the vicinity of the Exclusive Economic Zone of Ecuador, affecting migratory species ...", ... https://t.co/dl1rTWDvZF

899801973754560512.text: "We will make these agreements public so that everyone knows them!", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899801932713349121.text: "We have reached agreements with the financial sector organizations of the Popular and Solidarity Economy", @ Lenin ... https://t.co/2mgHfLaNmv

899801840652611584.text: "We are ready to advance in its strengthening for the benefit of all", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899801807584677888.text: "On the other hand, last week we finalized the diagnosis of the hydrocarbon sector", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/T46y0aPPfQ

899801698834821120.text: "... but the peasant, as the poet Antonio Machado said: 'Look at the sky with a restless eye, if the rain takes'', @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

899801656128405508.text: "We city-dwellers have distanced ourselves from nature, and when it rains in the city, we become frightened and take refuge ...", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

899801606342025216.text: "... enjoy every day the colors of the dawn, red and starry night. How different we are! ", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

899801562092105733.text: "... however, our peasant has the most beautiful view, the most beautiful of landscapes ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899801516617342976.text: "The city dwellers look for houses, apartments or offices with a good view, which increases the price ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899801252510535680.text: "As I have said several times, this is a high priority issue for my Government", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

899800895579443200.text: "We are fulfilling our campaign offers", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

898967705407160325.text: "Dear warriors of peace and life, Welcome to the #GranMingaAgropecuaria!", @Lenin Moreno https://t.co/OReLLeKGcd

898967367480295424.text: "You are the heroes of the #Columbian Revolution", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria https://t.co/Q567b3EOYi

898966982032216065.text: "Because we are different, we are better", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria https://t.co/mPlOcSzEoX

898966801488371712.text: "We go forward, revolution is transformation, change, take everything that has been done and improve it", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898966566120824832.text: "We are going to worry about eradicating extreme poverty", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898966482150858752.text: "We will continue to build the #Ecuador we want, we will not leave anyone behind", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898966381760319488.text: "We will not abandon them, dear peasants", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898966197143732226.text: "We will move forward the @PlanTodaUnaVida.We will not rest until all the inhabitants have a house", @Lenin #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898965899281039366.text: "We have given the frank hand to the mayor of Quevedo to build houses for the beautiful people who deserve it", @ Lenin ... https://t.co/0Enb7eQATG

898965067177316352.text: "In Quevedo, the # MisiónCasaParaTodos will begin with the construction of 1,000 houses", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898964411989331972.text: "We have a future towards certain purposes, towards certain projects", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria https://t.co/PkxGPBjKM9

898964262042861568.text: "A responsible government must provide timely credit to move forward with their crops", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

898963746881769474.text: "No to dictatorships, no repression, no failure to fulfill campaign promises!", @Lenin Moreno #GranMingaAgropecuaria

897548883475214342.text: Check #InformePetroleroEc from Esmeraldas on behalf of the President @Lenin Moreno ➡️ https://t.co/h38OuKBQF7 https://t.co/nNptBnaYM6

897547867602247680.text: "The honest ones are more; to the dishonest and we will put them before justice ", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897547805782298624.text: "After evaluating options, I made the decision that the Sacha field be exploited by @PetroamazonasEP", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897547641793515520.text: "Count on us, we undoubtedly count on you", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc https://t.co/kCkdwwxJC5

897547414420283395.text: "The safety of you and your families must be our priority", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897547181611241473.text: "... the prison of previous commitments and worse of perverse and dishonest commitments", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897547044398804992.text: "Do not worry so much about uncertainty, it's the securities that often represent ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897546974764912640.text: "We all know the good work they do and that contributes to the aggrandizement of the country", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897546882561572864.text: "We value the oil sector and its honest workers, who are the majority", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897546616495906816.text: "... an investment of USD 2,000 million in the next 4 years", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897546548426551296.text: "We will launch the Ronda de Campos Minores and the Intracampos, which will mean ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897546200273911808.text: "It is a more attractive and convenient model in the current market conditions", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897545921092825088.text: "We will have new oil rounds to attract investment, and we will do it through participation contracts", @Lenin #InformePetroleroEc

897545633233608705.text: "This saving will allow to invest in social works, create jobs and improve living conditions", @Lenin #InformePetroleroEc

897545540950413312.text: "Therefore, we must increase our refining capacity and thus avoid the exit of foreign currency", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897545437707554816.text: "... since our refineries can not satisfy the national demand", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897545399807778816.text: "Currently, more than USD 1,700 million are needed to import fuels ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897545357869056000.text: "Only in this way can we execute it transparently, putting the interests of the country ahead", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897545285626417156.text: "In this context we can project the # RefineríaDelPacífico in its right dimension and investment requirements", @Lenin #InformePetroleroEc

897545047901708291.text: "... but where to direct our talent and experience", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544979974807553.text: "It's not about how much oil our subsoil has, which is vast ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544679167741952.text: We must continue analyzing the evolution and the sustainable use of our natural resources ", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544643335860224.text: "However, we must look beyond our oil fields", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544510166761472.text: "The hydrocarbon activity is vital for the development of the country", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544416839081984.text: "... but we are sure that we will be able to certify new reserves", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544318767988736.text: "The truth is that at the current production rate, the country would have 20 years ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897544017122033666.text: "Many wonder: how long will we have oil?", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897543910641283072.text: "We have managed to reduce the rates of specific service contracts in the Shushufindi and Libertador fields", @Lenin #InformePetroleroEc

897543515990831104.text: I know of the efforts to achieve greater productivity and new reserves, as has happened in the ITT, Block 43, "#InformePetroleroEc

897543165384679424.text: "Today, the international conditions of the oil market project stability around prices", #InformePetroleroEc

897543098636660737.text: "Consultant Arthur D 'Little: @PetroamazonasEP is among the best performing companies in the international industry", #PertrollerEc Report

897542606036520961.text: "... thanks to the talent and experience of our workers ", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897542557718261761.text: "In terms of exploration and production activities, it is gratifying to see how production costs are decreasing ...", #InformePetroleroEc

897542327178285056.text: "There are important resources that will be used for the @PlanTodaUnaVida and # MisiónCasaParaTodos", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897542281481289730.text: "This renegotiation will save the State USD 250 million, only in 2018", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc https://t.co/51Q93eUimU

897540953430511619.text: "We must take advantage of the mechanisms that #OPEP offers us," @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897540883138191361.text: "Small in production volumes, yes, but with enormous capacity and experience in forums of such magnitude", @Lenin #InformePetroleroEc

897540794789359617.text: "We are in #OPEP, where international media point to Ecuador as the smallest, but with equal rights", #InformePetroleroEc

897539534405152770.text: "Nothing is more valuable than human life! Never doubt that your tranquility and that of your families is our priority! ", #ReportPetroleroEc

897539356059090944.text: "... can have fatal consequences for life and the environment", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897539275129999360.text: "A poorly made design, a worn tool, a badly placed nut ...", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897539160533344258.text: "We are not only interested in combating corruption, but also ensuring your safety", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897539080577318913.text: "With determination and commitment of all, we will succeed! The # Fight against Corruption is a priority issue! ", ... https://t.co/iLOIwzK7y1

897538738888245248.text: "This is how honest workers should act!", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc https://t.co/3p9w2UkpDB

897538560013721600.text: "The technical problems must be corrected with work, efficiency, honesty, transparent information", #Pertroller ReportEc

897538396314357760.text: "Fellow oil workers: count on the support of the Government and support us by denouncing irregularities! ... https://t.co/kBFNfGTMzc

897537998547329024.text: "... that the damage caused by some scoundrels", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897537910421016576.text: "We value oil workers. The good that they have done to the country is much greater ... ", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897537812504993793.text: What a pity that the wrongdoing of some, has affected the reputation of this sector, a pillar in the national development ... https://t.co/UEFxIIFob9

897537265089470464.text: "And we have achieved multiple social and environmental benefits", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEc

897537172705865729.text: "In the last decade we have regained sovereignty over our natural resources, including the oil sector", #InformePetroleroEc

897537025078943744.text: "... stress that much has been achieved, is for you, not on the part of the scoundrels who have taken the country" #ReportPetroleroEC

897536823211298817.text: "It is sad to see what many or few have done in Ecuador. However, it is important ... "@ Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEC

897536093310025733.text: "And I have been able to verify that there has been an enormous irresponsibility", @Lenin Moreno #InformePetroleroEC https://t.co/NxHpvmb9kT

897535690828853250.text: "I'm usually a friendly and smiling face, but there are things that definitely erase the smile on my face", ... https://t.co/MmLpjYEoW8

897267782622081024.text: "Welcome, dear young people, to the construction of our country! We continue to meet! ", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897267738435084288.text: "... destined to attend, motivate, train, strengthen, empower and protect these new entrepreneurs in the country" @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

897267573657657344.text: "Today we launched" Impulso Joven ", which is our policy towards youth ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma https://t.co/6zJiZcOLoL

897267389963935745.text: "We offered that we would take care of and support each one of you from birth until God decides to close our eyes" #ElGobiernoInforma

897267331709251584.text: "... that ensure a quality education, during a lifetime", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897267286108753920.text: "Those units that need it will be strengthened and all the requirements will be met ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897267245482745857.text: "For this, pedagogical or logistical support will be provided to the units that require it", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897267201941659648.text: "... regardless of its size or location, have that quality education", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897267162108186624.text: "We are designing an integrated education system in the territory, so that every educational unit ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266934818811904.text: "... to access schools and colleges. Some have transportation difficulties and others travel through roads in poor condition ", #ElGobiernoInforma

897266895832969216.text: "I commented my concern for the number of children and young people, who have to travel enormous distances ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266851561881601.text: "For this, we are going to make a deal for the good treatment. I repeat, a deal for good treatment ", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266811867205632.text: "Everyone, without exception, we must be treated with quality and warmth", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266761262919680.text: "We have to take advantage of, or improve, the existing infrastructure", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266719932252161.text: "... so that the institutions that provide this service, work in a coordinated manner", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266667608211456.text: "Strengthening of the comprehensive public health network ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma https://t.co/iq4S80HVqT

897266491782975490.text: "Soon we will have the neighborhood doctor", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897266395574132736.text: "We will recover the vocation of the doctor of yesteryear, the doctor with whom we felt in good hands", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma

897266173263392769.text: "I have arranged to @Salud_EC be undertaken in a sustained plan of sensitive improvement of the centers ...", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/rfB5qWKwQ0

897265950080327682.text: "In Sigchos I commented that I am very worried because I saw the poor state of many health centers", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897265891859103744.text: "I remember now that my mother used to say:" The closer you are to the truth, the more nervous the guilty get, "#ElGobiernoInforma

897265832539160576.text: "... this is everyone's task, let's not lower our guard", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897265744169140225.text: "You are witnesses of the efforts of the Government in the fight against corruption ...", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/VaU0ArZBrR

897265373128667138.text: "... our deepest desire that they will soon reach peace and that no more blood will be spilled.", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897265321823916032.text: "Our deep solidarity with the Venezuelan people ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897265262646263808.text: "We express our respect for the self-determination of peoples and non-interference", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/CPf9W8C3vJ

897265064595431424.text: "The best mechanism for this is direct democracy, for the leaders it should be the last word", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897264773762560000.text: "Democracy is one in which problems are solved with dialogue between all actors ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897264727663013888.text: "It does not stop worrying us also the amount of political prisoners", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897264672994455552.text: "... the death of human beings is a fact that we must regret and reject energetically", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma

897249433095741441.text: President @Lenin Moreno shared a moment with young people from the Sub-20 of @ Aucas45 | #ImpulsoJovenEc https://t.co/nkwZcQcGoI

897246113086017537.text: "We will expand the work places for young people, those who start and those who are professionalized", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897245989203038214.text: "Young people, if anyone decides to devote himself to politics, do it, but the bad guys will do it for you", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897245199889510409.text: "Go ahead, if you propose, everyone can be at your feet", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897245091093516288.text: "You are not alone, dear young people, you will never be, we will be by your side, a whole life!", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897245026908033024.text: "We count on you, we will not do anything for youth without youth", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244940828389376.text: "Count on me and your Government for it", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc https://t.co/5R0YvsNFac

897244696820547584.text: "... promote ideas and apply those talents and potentials we have", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244642479132672.text: "With honesty, with transparency, we must be generators of employment ...", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244575366082560.text: "The well-understood policy is the art of serving others", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244523843211264.text: "Our youth has the ideals, the creativity, the energy and the capacity to transform the whole world", @Lenin #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244438967332864.text: "It's not enough to be good professionals, but good citizens", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244360521207808.text: "I will not tire of telling parents and teachers that young people should follow the career of their dreams", @Lenin #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244302887276544.text: "We are all Ecuador, we are all made of this same mud", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244227490504704.text: "Friends, we have the challenge of creating more training opportunities for young people", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244144476852225.text: "Today they have many more opportunities than before, take them!", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897244027111735297.text: "Since May we have delivered USD 30 million in loans to young people between 18 and 30 years old", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc https://t.co/tAPzpRwrMy

897243885289836544.text: "A little over two months ago we have begun to fulfill our campaign promises" @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897243822182334464.text: "... they are more than enough guarantee for us", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJuvenilEc

897243689424228353.text: "Your youth, your vocation, your eagerness for service work and improvement ...", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJuvenilEc

897243518334382080.text: "We are here for and for you", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897243454912294912.text: "A model of responsible State, as we promised in our government plan", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897243349857558529.text: "We trust in you, we put in your hands the future of this wonderful Homeland", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897243200414507009.text: "We have the responsibility as a Government to believe in you", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc https://t.co/20coMmL1fA

897242972152115200.text: We trust in you, we put in your hands the future of this wonderful Homeland @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242925184294912.text: "We trust in you, that is the role of a State", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242586552967168.text: "We have the responsibility as a Government to believe in you" @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242537332809728.text: "Now we provide facilities to access credits without real guarantee, only with a joint and several signature", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242336811503616.text: "With the program #ImpulsoJovenEc we seek to improve the educational, economic, and productive conditions", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242160214544384.text: "The new blood of this revolution is young people", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242052550955009.text: "We can not harvest anything tomorrow if we do not sow today", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897242011874545664.text: "What better strength than the wonderful strength of youth", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897241073956900865.text: "... delivered the first credits for the young entrepreneurship", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897240611413274625.text: "... in the legitimate desires of economic and labor improvement, for that reason I am glad that today they have ...", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897240006762397697.text: "I trust youth, their potential, their freshness in the energy they have ...", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897239720744431616.text: "You are the present and the future of the country", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897239648577220609.text: "... this project, because here is the future of Ecuador", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897239451289751552.text: "I am very happy that @BanEcuadorBP, @InclusionEc and the Youth Secretariat have started ...", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

897239019658018816.text: "Youth is a state of life where you have a lot of enthusiasm to create, innovate", @Lenin Moreno #ImpulsoJovenEc

895716001572114436.text: "Let's not betray those who died so that we achieve freedom, peace, justice, fairness and respect", @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895714839007567872.text: "Prosperity, sovereignty, freedom and peace can not remain if there is no transparency, justice", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895714520697647105.text: "I invite you, uniformed brothers, to consolidate our achievements, seedbeds of progress and patriotism", @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895714083399487488.text: "Today we commemorate the revolution that gave birth to freedom", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713730721460224.text: ... where the National Academy of History and the National Academy of Military History will have a determining role, #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713670554058752.text: "... the restoration of the much-needed Permanent Commission of Civic Commemorations ..." @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713634655055872.text: "To avoid that erosion of the collective memory, I am pleased to inform that I have just disposed ...", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713597275475968.text: "We must value the study of history, identity, historical references", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713556645236736.text: "We must value the inherited heritage, raise our self-esteem, invigorate our identity", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895713388608843776.text: "You who have a vocation for service and security, are great values ​​that we must persevere", @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895712906616205312.text: "Vices with which I will never compromise", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895710958634532865.text: "A democracy without controls, without accountability only engenders authoritarianism and corruption", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895708868373860357.text: "Loyalty is not to people, it is very clear, it is to the Fatherland", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895708816989462530.text: It is about maintaining a public ethic, this is a principle on which trust and loyalty rises, @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895707957094219776.text: We have @FFAAECUADOR more professionals than a decade ago, committed to democracy and the Constitution, #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895707665820790784.text: "Our commitment is to support them always", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895707619205275651.text: "The most important thing for this Government is the people and you are a uniformed people", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895704576015429632.text: "... Why should I not trust them, to take care of my own integrity? ... ", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895702341256712194.text: "... could not have today the valuable contingent of our soldiers", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895702272700813312.text: "Families, children, parents: our gratitude and recognition, without your support in Ecuador ...", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895702227343597568.text: "Today I congratulate the new Generals, you are an example of dedication and love for your uniform", @Lenin Moreno #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895701562676391936.text: "My affectionate greeting to 41,000 women and men of @FFAAECUADOR and 8,000 aspirants in the process of formation" ... https://t.co/WSYTCoL742

895701295776100352.text: "The Army is a modern, strong institution, committed to national interests", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/IqNJw5Bljg

895701182290833408.text: "That struggle claimed values, ethical and moral principles, transformed an unjust social structure", @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895700911066144768.text: "My affectionate greeting to the 41000 women and men of @FFAAECUADOR and to the 8000 aspirants in the process of formation" #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

895700081533472769.text: "That First Scream of Independence represented the beginning of a path not always easy towards freedom", @Lenin #EcuadorTierraDeLibertad

891106460435968000.text: "A big hug compatriots", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891105295891607552.text: "For transfers and donations of capital and investments: USD 3,241 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891105258486870016.text: "For transfers from public companies and the @BancoCentral_Ec: USD 3,322 million," @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891104957683953665.text: "The assumptions of the proforma establish that Ecuadorian oil is budgeted at USD 41.69 per barrel", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC

891104883960668160.text: "This corresponds to what is indispensable for the operation of public services", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891104623058067456.text: "In September I will announce the complete economic program that will govern us the next years, fulfilling the Law deadlines", # ECeconomic Report

891104572730748928.text: "... for the fulfillment of the national development goals and objectives", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891104492653096960.text: "... mainly in hiring personnel, consultancies, advertising, vehicles, travel, among others", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC

891104443420348416.text: 4. From the 1st. government day we established austere measures of public expenditure, optimization of State resources # EconomicReport EC

891104338411651072.text: 2. Encourage investment and foreign exchange income, with a bill that allows the repatriation of capitals # EconomicReport EC

891104282052874240.text: "... and the revision of the" Capital Gains Law, without giving up the fight against land speculation ", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC

891104246975868928.text: 1. To stimulate the construction sector with a project of promotion and facilitation ..., @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891104207780052992.text: "I have arranged that - immediately - the following actions be carried out:", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891104166638215168.text: "... increase our exports, the income of dollars to the economy, and encourage private investment", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC

891104113366355968.text: "The situation is critical. We need to improve financing conditions, generate more income ", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC

891103620791500800.text: "... reached an aggregate amount of USD 41,893 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891103491590160385.text: "... not to mention the devastating effects of the 2016 earthquake", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891103447839383556.text: "Reduction in the price of oil, low prices of raw materials, appreciation of the dollar ...", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891103407351660544.text: "For 2 years, the country has been facing difficult conditions due to:", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891103222504595458.text: "... and pay the amortizations of internal and external debt", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEconómicoEC

891103167173337089.text: "It requires about USD 8,000 million each year to cover the fiscal deficit", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891103120822087681.text: "We have important financing needs", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

891102400739782656.text: "There is nothing more revolutionary than truth and transparency with our people", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/gk5rcG4P4F

866478558163722248.text: We share what was the interview to @MashiRafael with the medium @ C5N and the journalist @robdnavarro ▶ ️ ... https://t.co/j6XsDRvKO1

866477908394639361.text: "We are a Modern Left, where we look for non-market societies, but companies with markets" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866477875985305600.text: "1/2 What defines us as people of the Left is that we will always be the human being over the capital" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866477595868749824.text: "2/2 But who understands that society must dominate the market and not the market to society" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866477430516719622.text: "A well understood integration favors us all, it is something fundamental in the governments of Latin America" ​​@MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866477263012995072.text: "We all understand the importance of integration" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866477150609833986.text: "By being efficient and redistributing wealth in the best way, a historic reduction of poverty has been achieved" # RafaelEnC5N

866477105332334592.text: "Several decisions generate systemic competitiveness and social development" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476838268403712.text: "Technical decisions were made, for example to renegotiate foreign debt and oil contracts" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476780877754368.text: "We are transforming from a bourgeois state that represented a few, to a truly popular state" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476733532446720.text: "It is not technical but political, the power relations changed, in Ecuador the Ecuadorian people are in charge" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476555685507072.text: "We had the right to make two key reforms: #LOC and Judicial Reform" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476313858777089.text: "In Ecuador, public officials can not have operations in any # ParaísoFiscal" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866476170010918912.text: "Through Popular Consultation it was rejected that public officials have accounts in # ParaísosFiscales" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475988900864002.text: "We all know that the # ParaísosFiscales are a source of corruption" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475889265184770.text: "Who can justify a # ParaísoFiscal from the ethical point of view?" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475776459370498.text: "The # ParaísosFiscales are the most concrete sample of the supremacy of capital" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475527930093569.text: "Although actors from the Right prepared the 'fraud' show, they could not prove it and they were ridiculous" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475498536407042.text: "Despite the transparency of the election process in Ecuador, the Right did not want to accept defeat" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475189613232128.text: "Despite the conservative onslaught of the Right, Ecuador cut that in the last elections" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475110030606337.text: "Historical processes also have setbacks but never return to the original starting point" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475047606771714.text: "The victories of progressive governments were impressive during these last years" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866475015465840644.text: "For us, Revolution is not violence but a radical, deep and rapid change of the existing structures" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474988471189505.text: "The logic of a statesman is completely different to the business logic" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474961027903488.text: "The leadership of a country must be in the hands of politicians with responsibility and democratic legitimacy" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474931835588613.text: "A statesman was needed to see a whole, not just a part as business logic" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474896699863044.text: "We would not have won the elections if the people did not believe in what we say and fulfill" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474864827408385.text: We had a proposal, we had a legacy and the Ecuadorian people won "@MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474835505033216.text: "Despite being a tremendously difficult time, despite the media framig, the Ecuadorian people won" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N

866474806350360576.text: "The union of an entire people that never wants to return to the past" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
